Game - Class in main
The Game class is responsible for the main running of the game, including the initialization of the game window (JFrame), handling level setup, and transitions between menus and levels.

GameView - Class in main
Provides a visual representation of a game level, including background layers, player status indicators (health bar, armor status, kill count), and victory or special condition images.
GameView(GameLevel, int, int) - Constructor for class main.GameView
Constructs a GameView with specified dimensions and associates it with a game level.
